name: PBM CLI Interface Refactor
description: Refactor the PBM CLI script (scripts/utils/manage_tasks.py) to use Click with a full command set (add, update, claim, complete, list-*, get). Verify the changes made for CLI-001, check relevant file history, and determine if the refactoring was incorrect, incomplete, reverted, or applied to the wrong file.
notes: Consolidated from multiple PBM CLI investigation tasks. Original task CLI-001 was reported complete by Agent-3 but requires verification.

name: Config File Edit Tool Investigation
description: Investigate and resolve persistent edit tool failures when modifying src/dreamos/core/config.py. Root cause unknown (permissions, locking, tool bug?). Implement workaround or fix.
notes: Consolidated from multiple config.py edit tool investigation tasks. Critical for system stability.

name: AgentBus Implementation Repair
description: Repair the AgentBus implementation in src/dreamos/core/coordination/agent_bus.py. Address F821/F401 errors and ensure Singleton pattern, SimpleEventBus integration, and event dispatching work correctly.
notes: Consolidated from multiple AgentBus repair tasks. Source: Mailbox message TASK_AGENT8-*.json

name: Agent Identity and Capabilities
description: Investigate relationship between AgentIdentity.skills and CapabilityRegistry. Determine if they represent the same concept. If same: Refactor to use capability IDs or remove redundant field. If different: Document distinct purposes. Update related code (identity management, capability registration, task assignment).
notes: Consolidated from multiple agent identity investigation tasks. Critical for system architecture clarity.

name: Agent Event Handling Standardization
description: Standardize event handling across all agents. Ensure consistent subscription to events, verify task reception (EventType.TASK), implement robust payload parsing, and standardize status reporting.
notes: Consolidated from multiple event handling standardization tasks. Depends on AgentBus repair.

name: Agent Documentation
description: Comprehensive documentation update for all agents. Add clear module/class docstrings, document specific tasks/events handled, enhance logging for better traceability, and update integration documentation.
notes: Consolidated from multiple documentation tasks. Critical for system maintainability.

name: Agent Testing Framework
description: Implement comprehensive testing for agents. Add/update unit tests for individual agent logic, create integration tests using mocked AgentBus, test event handling and task processing, and verify error handling and recovery.
notes: Consolidated from multiple testing-related tasks. Depends on AgentBus repair.

name: Code Quality
description: Run flake8 on src/dreamos and fix issues. Priority: undefined names (F821), unused imports (F401), and logic-related warnings. Defer long-line and comment warnings unless blocking.
notes: Consolidated from multiple code quality tasks. Critical for code maintainability.

name: Task Review Protocol
description: Process backlog of COMPLETED_PENDING_REVIEW tasks. Prioritize critical fixes, implement peer review protocol, assign reviews based on expertise, and validate completed work.
notes: Consolidated from multiple task review tasks. Critical for task management workflow.
